product_name: ExOfficio ExO JavaTech T-Shirt - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The women's ExO JavaTech(TM) T-shirt from ExOfficio helps you keep your cool whether you're on an exotic tropical adventure or just spending a day in your yard. Innovative S Cafe(R) fabric technology uses the carbon in recycled coffee grounds to wick away moisture and control odor, keeping you cool and fresh day after day. Lightweight cotton/polyester fabric dries fast and is soft and comfortable next to your skin. V-neck and contrast seams add eye-catching style. ExOfficio ExO JavaTech short-sleeve T-shirt features a small interior pocket for storing a key, mini media player or other small essential. Closeout.
short_description: The women's ExO JavaTech(TM) T-shirt from ExOfficio helps you keep your cool whether you're on an exotic tropical adventure or just spending a day in your yard.
